item.title: No, no family topics here
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Someone asked me why I don’t post topics about family here, I said, no, no family topics here. The problem is that now a world there are way too many ways to leak personal information to the public, I don’t want to add on one more possibility to hurt my family, though potentially. So, I [...]
item.content:encoded:
Someone asked me why I don’t post topics about family here, I said, no, no family topics here.

The problem is that now a world there are way too many ways to leak personal information to the public, I don’t want to add on one more possibility to hurt my family, though potentially.

So, I wish I made it clear, and let’s go back to geek (or, nerd) world.
